ComicInfo.Summary: This is the 2004 Dawn Convention sketchbook collection. 22 pages of Dawn in a range of clothes and poses. Instead of the usual foreword this time Linsner annotates the pages instead. As he is working on the the Dark Ivory comic book series he includes a few sketches of Tobias Esque and Ivory herself. Also included are some photos of the initial work on the McFarlane Dawn statuette. Linsner's convention sketchbooks are just that.. sketches done at conventions for sale. Most of them are quick and simple and studies of dawn in poses and outfits, with the occasional other character thrown in. This is one for the Dawn / Linsner collectors and those who are interested in ideas of how convention sketching is done.
